name: Portfolio in Figma
description:
This is a simple portfolio which can be used directly from Figma using the prototype option. This is something that a beginner or a newbie can use to create their first portfolio


The design is interactive such as

  • Clicking nav-links get you to pages
  • The resume button can be made into a link
  • The case studies can have external links to Behance/Medium
  • The buttons in the contact section can also be made to link some external sites


PS - You can find how to in the About Section of this file
